name: The Heist (itch) (Sam Mifflin)
description:
This a game I created on my second year at university during my Game A Week assignment. You can find out more about the Game A Week on my Instagram page @Sam_Mifflin.

https://www.instagram.com/sam_mifflin/

The theme for this week was traitor

In this game you play story and pick options to see the different outcomes. Made using Ren'Py.

Will you be able to pull off the heist?????

I hope you enjoy.
